data.oai_dc:dc: Ruaha dry season 2013 camera trap location covariates

Variables recorded for each camera location and used to model species co-occurrence in Ruaha NP during the dry season of 2013. The file includes the camera trap location name (Station), the elevation (Altitude), an index of vegetation density (VegDens), an encounter rate for lion prey (LionPrey), and encounter rate for spotted hyaena prey (HyenaPrey), and the distance to the Great Ruaha River (Dist2Water).
